summary: Greedy locals are trying to turn some beach property into a tourist attraction, and a computer expert sets out to use is knowledge of computers--along with the help of several local "beach bunnies"--to stop them.
cast: Stacey Nemour|Hank Amico|André Chimène|Hunter Vail|Rich Brakedale|Grany Goracy|Roger Nemour|Randall Oliver|Panther|Jeffrey Wurthmann
title: Computer Beach Party
